content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: "I'm interested in hearing your proposal for the rental price of this 25 square meter apartment. What are your thoughts?"
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
The proposed rental price is 800 Euro per month."

"I see. That's a reasonable price. Can you consider lowering it for me?"
name: Max Müller

content: "I can provide a discount of 100 Euro per month. However, I would prefer to rent it for 900 Euro per month."
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept the rental price of 900 Euro per month."

"Great! I agree to the price of 900 Euro per month. I'd be happy to rent this apartment for that rate."
name: Max Müller

content: "I apologize, but I must politely decline your offer of 900 Euro per month. I am unable to accept that price at this time. I hope we can continue to discuss a suitable rental price."
name: Heinrich Heine
